TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdamInstance extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer

summary.span: 类表示一个 AD LDS 实例服务器。

span.span: The class represents an AD LDS instance server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类引用到 Active Directory 应用程序模式 (ADAM) 的已重命名为 Active Directory 轻型目录服务 (AD LDS)。The class refers to Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) which has been renamed to Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).

span.span: Demand value:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CheckReplicationConsistency() cil managed

summary.span: 调用知识一致性检查 (KCC)，以验证此 AD LDS 实例的复制拓扑。

span.span: Invokes the Knowledge Consistency Checker (KCC) that verifies the replication topology for this AD LDS instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，参阅 MSDN Library 中的主题"DsReplicaConsistencyCheck" [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information, see the topic "DsReplicaConsistencyCheck" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

The object has been disposed.
